projects.title: Vacabuddy
projects.summary: Vacabuddy is a web application that allows a user to search for restaurants, events and breweries based on the users choice of City

projects.title: GitMoney
projects.summary: A Full-Stack application that allows users to interact with live and historical stock data in a friendly and visual way including charts and tables. View current and past data about stock(s) that a user is interested in, sorted by daily, weekly, or monthly tracking. View historical data for years of information. Or make a dashboard with your favorite stocks with custom notes and minute-to-minute charts.

projects.title: The Grid
projects.summary: The Grid is a Single Pack React Application built on MERN Stack that is a social hub for the gaming community. You can sign up, create a profile, add allies, create/join clans, share posts, and comment on them.
